name: Distorted Realis (DecentBlack_KNY)
description:
Distorted Realis is a game created during our 8 Week FMP in our team of 2 coders/1 developer and 2 artists and we create the studio "Satoru Studios". This game was created over 8 weeks and is missing a few elements.

The game is a roguelike dungeon crawler where you need to defeat enemies, move from room to room and survive as long as you possibly can. You follow the main character just after a breakup as he fights the negative emotions flooding his subconscious in order to come out of his depression and start living a normal and happy life again.
